00053 template<unsigned ELEMENT_DIM, unsigned SPACE_DIM = ELEMENT_DIM>
00054 class MonodomainProblem : public AbstractCardiacProblem<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM, 1>
00055 {
00057     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00064     template<class Archive>
00065     void serialize(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00066     {
00067         archive & boost::serialization::base_object<AbstractCardiacProblem<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM, 1> >(*this);
00068         archive & mpMonodomainTissue;
00069     }
00070 
00071 protected:
00073     MonodomainTissue<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* mpMonodomainTissue;
00074 
00075 public:
00077     AbstractCardiacTissue<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM>* CreateCardiacTissue();
00078 
00080     AbstractDynamicLinearPdeSolver<ELEMENT_DIM, SPACE_DIM, 1>* CreateSolver();
00081 
00082 public:
00088     MonodomainProblem(AbstractCardiacCellFactory<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM>* pCellFactory);
00089 
00093     MonodomainProblem();
00094 
00098     virtual ~MonodomainProblem();
00099 
00101     MonodomainTissue<ELEMENT_DIM,SPACE_DIM> * GetMonodomainTissue();
00102 
00108     void WriteInfo(double time);
00109 
00114     virtual void DefineWriterColumns(bool extending);
00115 
00123     virtual void WriteOneStep(double time, Vec voltageVec);
00124 
00125 };
